title_it: I apologize, but the text "Cowtow" does not appear to be a complete or recognizable English poem. If you provide more context or another English poem, I can offer you a translation into Italian.
poem_en: Inhale and then plead, clinging upon edge and brink, beyond the release.
poem_it: Inspirare e poi supplicare, aggrapparsi all'orlo e al limite, oltre il rilascio.
